entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon then 30 percent chance of rain showers this afternoon. High 7. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of rain or snow. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of rain beginning in the afternoon then changing to periods of light snow late in the afternoon. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Wednesday 29 March 2023
